category: news
title: "Bring your own model for Amazon SageMaker labeling workflows with active learning"
excerpt: "With Amazon SageMaker Ground Truth, you can easily and inexpensively build accurately labeled machine learning (ML) datasets. To decrease labeling costs, SageMaker Ground Truth uses active learning to differentiate between data objects (like images or documents) that are difficult and easy to label."
